# init(layoutSize:)

**Initializer**

Creates an item of the specified size.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize)
```

## Creating an item

- **init(layoutSize:supplementaryItems:)**: Creates an item of the specified size with an array of supplementary items to attach to the item.
